name: HamstAR (FrancysDong)
description:
HamstAR is an AR interactive experience designed for mobile platforms, featuring a digital pet who can accompany and interact with users both digitally on the phone and physically via a hardware equipped on a finger.

Published for 2022 NYU Game Center Showcase.

Only featured android build right now.

Play it in person with the hardware in the showcase!

Follow us on @HamstAR_Game twitter to get the latest progress!
